price: Guyyaa qabaa guddaa qabnu Nuti haaloo bahatoodha.
arabic: يَوۡمَ نَبۡطِشُ ٱلۡبَطۡشَةَ ٱلۡكُبۡرَىٰٓ إِنَّا مُنتَقِمُونَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: yawma nabṭishu al-baṭshata al-kub'rā innā muntaqimūna
